name: To Gather: Island (Survival Action Adventure Game)
name_original: To Gather: Island (Survival Action Adventure Game)
description:
To-Gather Island is a new survival action adventure game from Studio Kamii. In To-Gather Island, you are a researcher and conjurer,  separated from your team on a beautiful, mysterious, yet dangerous environment. With help from your loyal golem companion, you set out to discover the island's secrets and to save your friends from a mysterious threat.

Survive by gathering resources, crafting, building and cultivating the land while fighting enemies on this science-fantasy themed game

Developer note: This game is in still very early in development. We are putting it up online to get feedback and cool ideas from you guys. :)

Disclaimer: The version available for download here is a pre-alpha build for demo purposes. It is not the full game.
